name: Off The Record: The Art of Deception - A Hidden Object Mystery (Full)
name_original: Off The Record: The Art of Deception - A Hidden Object Mystery (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

A lost masterpiece has been found in Austria and the artist in charge of restoring it, Lisa Steiner, has chosen to talk to only you about this discovery! When you arrive for the interview, she disappears without explanation. Now it’s up to you to find her and retrieve the story the world is waiting for!

• FIND OUT WHY THIS ART PIECE IS BEING KEPT UNDER WRAPS
Though you only expect to meet the artist, her boyfriend, Felix, is accompanying her. One can’t help but be suspicious of him… you must find out his intentions and help protect Lisa!

• CAN YOU DECIPHER LISA’S CLUES AND SAVE HER BEFORE IT’S TOO LATE?
Play through immersive hidden object scenes and find the hints you need to get closer to the truth.

• BRING PEACE BACK TO THE IDYLLIC TOWN IN THE AUSTRIAN ALPS
Help restore calmness by playing entertaining mini-games and deciphering clever puzzles and find out what went wrong.

• UNCOVER ANOTHER MYSTERY IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Continue your investigative work in the bonus game and enjoy Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible souvenirs and special achievements!
